sentence.text: Bardet-Biepositive regulation of I-kappaB kinase/NF-kappaB signaling Syndrome (visual perception) is a rare multi-systemic disease with autosomal recessive transmission.

entity.text: positive regulation of I-kappaB kinase/NF-kappaB signaling

sentence.text: Currently, 21 genes (visual perception1-21) present on different chromosomes have been mapped: these genes are responsible for BBS phenotypes and they show a great heterogeneity of mutations.The most common genes are retina homeostasis (locus 11q13) and BBS10.We show here the case of a 50 year old patient with BBS.
